item.title: Setting Up Academic Theme
item.description: Academic theme is great, well-thought in design and popular with users. Did pay up for a coffee on paypal. I’m migrating from a Jekyll-based CV theme (was a good start and helped to sort out information, but did never lead to new contacts and was not extensible, did set up once, rarely updated). Some personal notes on setup: - contacts section configurtion explained in Leslie Myint blog post - addeded StackOverflow icon - moved several files (including .
